author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 19, 2020
description: B.C.'s Minister of Public Safety Mike Farnworth is giving an update on the province's state of emergency at 10:30 a.m. on Sunday. The next update on COVID-19 cases is expected Monday afternoon.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • B.C.'s minister of public safety is giving an update on the province's state of emergency at 10:30 a.m. today.
  • The next update from provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry is Monday at 3 p.m.
  • As of Saturday, B.C. has 1,… [+3554 chars]
